txt.en: The bag is mostly empty, but a few of the bandages it once held remain. They are soft and damp to the touch. Your skin feels soothed when your fingers glide over them. No doubt these bandages are very valuable, and the Dragon-clan raiders would have taken them.
You place the bandages back into the bag from which they originally came. While the bag is not quite full, the majority of them have been returned.
There is no doubt that these bandages would catch a hefty price at auction.
The bag was filled with bandages soaked in healing salves, items that would fetch decent coin at auction.
The bandages were taken by raiders from the Dragon-clan who have a camp in the ruins to the east of the cart.\n\nYou should recover the stolen bandages.
Return the bandages to the shredded bag
The shredded bag the bandages belong in is at Andras' cart in the north of Starkmoor.\n\nThe bandages should be placed back inside the bag they originally came from.
